text: Xuchang () is a prefecture-level city in central Henan province, China. In 2010, 4,307,488 people lived there. ==Administration== The prefecture-level city of Xuchang administers 2 district, 2 county-level cities and 2 counties. *Weidu District () *Jian'an District () *Yuzhou City () *Changge City () *Yanling County () *Xiangcheng County () Category:Cities in China Category:Henan
title: Xuchang
